instructions.da: Drej til højresving videre ad Cool highway
instructions.en: Turn right to stay on Cool highway
instructions.es: Cruza a laderecha en Cool highway
instructions.es-ES: Cruce a la derecha en Cool highway
instructions.fi: Käänny oikeall(e/a) pysyäksesi tiellä Cool highway
instructions.fr: Tourner à droite pour rester Cool highway
instructions.he: פנה ימינה כדי להישאר בCool highway
instructions.it: Gira a destra per stare su Cool highway
instructions.nl: Sla rechts om op Cool highway te blijven
instructions.pl: Skręć w prawo, aby pozostać na Cool highway
instructions.pt-BR: Vire à direita para manter-se na Cool highway
instructions.pt-PT: Vire à direita para se manter em Cool highway
instructions.sv: Sväng höger och fortsätt på Cool highway
instructions.tr: Cool highway üzerinde kalmak için sağ yöne dön
instructions.vi: Quẹo phải để chạy tiếp trên Cool highway
instructions.zh-Hans: 在Cool highway上继续向右行驶
